answers.answer: You might want to post your question in another section, as this is pediatric heart forum, so questions pertaining to children's hearts.

question: I just came back from the doctors and had a heart check for 24 hours and had one 4 second pause while i was sleeping.  My doctor is now sending me to a heart doctor for further test.Now i do have trouble sleeping and I am on a sleeping machine, just started.   I also way 300 pounds and need to lose weight and I am going through the change at 52.   Plus I have epilespy, blood pressure is good and now diabetes.Any good suggestions?
title: 4 second pause while sleeping
